name: Village Soldier
text: Beyond this forest lie monsters of Chaos.

name: Village Soldier
text: Head EAST to reach Malakron's castle and defeat him and his forces.

name: Village Soldier
text: Defeat them, and the shadows will fade.

name: Village Soldier
text: The fate of Mora depends on you!
